short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds any page to the Things to-do app
short.ru: Добавляет любую страницу в менеджер задач Things 3
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 快速添加任何网页到 Things 3 App 里。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you add a page/tab URL to your Things mac app along with a selection as a note. 

Select a text and click the app icon in the extension, Page title, URL and Selected text are captured into the Things app using their URL schema.
